info.title: Material Documents - Read, Create
info.description: This service enables you to retrieve and create material documents, e.g. to post a goods receipt for a purchase order or to document the transfer of materials between two storage locations. Additionally, the service allows to cancel existing material documents or single items. It can be consumed by external systems and user interfaces.

x-sap-shortText: Use this synchronous inbound service to read and create material documents

get.summary: Reads information on material document header level
get.description: Reads material document header information to get an overview of the material document postings.

post.description: Cancels a complete material document that you specify by the material document number and year.

parameters.name: MaterialDocumentYear
parameters.description:
Material Doc. Year  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: MaterialDocument
parameters.description:
Material Document  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: PostingDate
parameters.description:
Posting Date  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `datetime`, e.g. `datetime'2017-12-31T00:00'`)

post.description: Cancels a material document item that you specify by the material document number, year and item number.

parameters.name: MaterialDocumentYear
parameters.description:
Material Doc. Year  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: MaterialDocument
parameters.description:
Material Document  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: MaterialDocumentItem
parameters.description:
Material Doc.Item  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: PostingDate
parameters.description:
Posting Date  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `datetime`, e.g. `datetime'2017-12-31T00:00'`)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_MaterialDocumentHeader HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
